metadata.title: CVE-2021-34981 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: [Bluetooth CMTP Module Double Free Privilege Escalation Vulnerability]

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
